TransformIO 1.0.1-SNAPSHOT API

TransformIO is an extract, transform and load tool driven by a XML configuration to specify record layouts using field level regex patterns.

See:
          Description

Packages
org.patrodyne.etl.transformio The core package contains the application launcher and the transformation engine.
org.patrodyne.etl.transformio.cli The Command Line Interface (CLI) package implements the terminal mode interface.
org.patrodyne.etl.transformio.gui The Graphical User Interface (GUI) package implements the desktop mode interface.
org.patrodyne.etl.transformio.io  
org.patrodyne.etl.transformio.jul  
org.patrodyne.etl.transformio.tui The Textual User Interface (TUI) package implements the curses mode interface.
org.patrodyne.etl.transformio.xml The batch XML binding package contains classes representing the batch configuration.

 

TransformIO is an extract, transform and load tool driven by a XML configuration to specify record layouts using field level regex patterns.

The launcher for TransformIO is in the core package. The launcher transfers control to one of the user interface packages based on the launch mode. The mode determines which user interface will be invoked, as follows:

  • Graphical User Interface
  • Textual User Interface
  • Command Line Interface

The implementation for each interface is found in the corresponding sub-package.
